column4: Morning all! I'm trying to play this video http://www.gametrailers.com/player.php?id=9357&type=mov (Huxley, new 360 game) but all I can get is that Totem could not play due to missing plugins. Can anyone tell me which plugis to get?
: I got all possible repositories added, do I ahve to look somewhere else for the w32 codecs?
